metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Pet Health Representative - Part Time
content:
Our Opportunity: 
Chewy is looking for Pet Health Representative - Telehealth Veterinarian to join our Healthcare Team. Come join our growing organization and be a part of revolutionizing the virtual care industry! Join a team that cares deeply about improving pet health compliance and providing best in class customer service for both the pet parent and veterinarian community. 
 
What You'll Do: 

The Pet Health Representative - Telehealth Veterinarian will participate and champion the support and education to Chewy's pet parents on products and services that help animal health and wellbeing
Provide subject matter expertise on companion animal health and wellness for Chewy Health
Participate in program development and enhancing training procedures
Identify and triage platform improvements and support innovative advancements
Collaborate with Chewy Health team members on the development of current and new services and products
Write, consult, review and approve editorial content for PetMD and beChewy
The position is intended to be remote, working from your home
Chewy offers full training and necessary materials for the veterinarian to support and provide effective communication with pet parents efficiently

What You'll Need: 

A Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM, VMD) or equivalent is required
Active License and in good standing
3+ years of small animal veterinary experience or equivalent industry experience
Must have proficient computer skills as this will require interacting with customers and Chewy team members remotely through an online platform
Someone who embraces forward thinking and curiosity
Has exemplary listening and problem-solving skills
Ability to multitask comfortably
Is comfortable collaborating with other veterinarians, utilizing a team-oriented environment
Is passionate about helping people and pets with empathy and excellent customer service focus
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Comfortable in a fast paced, self-starter environment
Have access to high-speed internet and additional back up WiFi via hotspot
Have a designated working space that is quiet and free from disruptions
Minimal travel required
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

SMS Consent: By providing my telephone number on this employment application form, I consent to receive automated text messages and pre-recorded voice messages from Chewy at that telephone number regarding any matter related to my job application to Chewy. Chewy will not use this telephone number for marketing or advertising solicitation purposes. Message and data rates may apply. You may opt out of these messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any text messages you receive.

questions.label: Internal purposes only - no need to answer *
Arbitration Agreement Signed?
Arbitration Agreement Signed Date

Deloitte is Chewy’s independent auditor. To not impair Deloitte's independence, Chewy must validate the role of any current or former Deloitte employee against any exempt role they are interviewing for at Chewy. Do you currently work for Deloitte or have you ever been employed by Deloitte in the past?

Close family ties to a Deloitte employee could also impair Deloitte’s independence as Chewy’s auditor should you become employed by Chewy.  Do you have a close family member (spouse or equivalent, parent, dependent, non-dependent child, and/or sibling) that currently works for Deloitte?
